sql-mapping.sql-content: SELECT a.YYYY, a.OrgCD, a.ACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(a.ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, a.EXECBUDGET01, a.REMBUDGET01, a.USEDBUDGET01, a.FINISHFLAG01, a.EXECBUDGET02, a.REMBUDGET02, a.USEDBUDGET02, a.FINISHFLAG02, a.EXECBUDGET03, a.REMBUDGET03, a.USEDBUDGET03, a.FINISHFLAG03, a.EXECBUDGET04, a.REMBUDGET04, a.USEDBUDGET04, a.FINISHFLAG04, a.EXECBUDGET05, a.REMBUDGET05, a.USEDBUDGET05, a.FINISHFLAG05, a.EXECBUDGET06, a.REMBUDGET06, a.USEDBUDGET06, a.FINISHFLAG06, a.EXECBUDGET07, a.REMBUDGET07, a.USEDBUDGET07, a.FINISHFLAG07, a.EXECBUDGET08, a.REMBUDGET08, a.USEDBUDGET08, a.FINISHFLAG08, a.EXECBUDGET09, a.REMBUDGET09, a.USEDBUDGET09, a.FINISHFLAG09, a.EXECBUDGET10, a.REMBUDGET10, a.USEDBUDGET10, a.FINISHFLAG10, a.EXECBUDGET11, a.REMBUDGET11, a.USEDBUDGET11, a.FINISHFLAG11, a.EXECBUDGET12, a.REMBUDGET12, a.USEDBUDGET12, a.FINISHFLAG12, CREATEDT, LASTUPDTM, LASTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) orgName FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGET a Where a.YYYY = ? and a.orgcd = ? Order by 3

SELECT a.YYYY, a.OrgCD, a.ACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(a.ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, get_budgetPlan(?,?,a.acctcd) EXECBUDGET, get_budget(?,?,a.acctcd) REMBUDGET, get_budgetUsed(?,?,a.acctcd) USEDBUDGET, get_execbudgetsum(?,?,a.acctcd) EXECBUDGETSUM, get_execbudgetsum(?,?,a.acctcd) - get_UsedbudgetSum(?,?,a.acctcd) REMBUDGETSUM, get_UsedbudgetSum(?,?,a.acctcd) USEDBUDGETSUM, CREATEDT, LASTUPDTM, LASTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) orgName FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGET a Where a.YYYY = ? and a.orgcd = ? Order by 3

SELECT a.YYYY, a.OrgCD, a.DACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(a.DACCTCD) DACCTNAME, a.PLANBUD01, a.EXECBUD01, a.REMBUD01, a.USEDBUD01, a.FINFLAG01, a.PLANBUD02, a.EXECBUD02, a.REMBUD02, a.USEDBUD02, a.FINFLAG02, a.PLANBUD03, a.EXECBUD03, a.REMBUD03, a.USEDBUD03, a.FINFLAG03, a.PLANBUD04, a.EXECBUD04, a.REMBUD04, a.USEDBUD04, a.FINFLAG04, a.PLANBUD05, a.EXECBUD05, a.REMBUD05, a.USEDBUD05, a.FINFLAG05, a.PLANBUD06, a.EXECBUD06, a.REMBUD06, a.USEDBUD06, a.FINFLAG06, a.PLANBUD07, a.EXECBUD07, a.REMBUD07, a.USEDBUD07, a.FINFLAG07, a.PLANBUD08, a.EXECBUD08, a.REMBUD08, a.USEDBUD08, a.FINFLAG08, a.PLANBUD09, a.EXECBUD09, a.REMBUD09, a.USEDBUD09, a.FINFLAG09, a.PLANBUD10, a.EXECBUD10, a.REMBUD10, a.USEDBUD10, a.FINFLAG10, a.PLANBUD11, a.EXECBUD11, a.REMBUD11, a.USEDBUD11, a.FINFLAG11, a.PLANBUD12, a.EXECBUD12, a.REMBUD12, a.USEDBUD12, a.FINFLAG12, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) orgName FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGETDETAIL a Where a.YYYY = ? and a.orgcd = ? and a.dacctcd = ? Order by 3

SELECT a.YYYY, SUBSTR(a.orgcd,1,2)||'00' orgCd, a.ACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(a.ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET01) EXECBUDGET01, SUM(a.REMBUDGET01) REMBUDGET01, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET01) USEDBUDGET01, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET02) EXECBUDGET02, SUM(a.REMBUDGET02) REMBUDGET02, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET02) USEDBUDGET02, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET03) EXECBUDGET03, SUM(a.REMBUDGET03) REMBUDGET03, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET03) USEDBUDGET03, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET04) EXECBUDGET04, SUM(a.REMBUDGET04) REMBUDGET04, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET04) USEDBUDGET04, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET05) EXECBUDGET05, SUM(a.REMBUDGET05) REMBUDGET05, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET05) USEDBUDGET05, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET06) EXECBUDGET06, SUM(a.REMBUDGET06) REMBUDGET06, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET06) USEDBUDGET06, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET07) EXECBUDGET07, SUM(a.REMBUDGET07) REMBUDGET07, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET07) USEDBUDGET07, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET08) EXECBUDGET08, SUM(a.REMBUDGET08) REMBUDGET08, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET08) USEDBUDGET08, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET09) EXECBUDGET09, SUM(a.REMBUDGET09) REMBUDGET09, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET09) USEDBUDGET09, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET10) EXECBUDGET10, SUM(a.REMBUDGET10) REMBUDGET10, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET10) USEDBUDGET10, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET11) EXECBUDGET11, SUM(a.REMBUDGET11) REMBUDGET11, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET11) USEDBUDGET11, SUM(a.EXECBUDGET12) EXECBUDGET12, SUM(a.REMBUDGET12) REMBUDGET12, SUM(a.USEDBUDGET12) USEDBUDGET12, CREATEDT, TO_ORGCDNAME(SUBSTR(a.orgcd,1,2)||'00') orgName FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGET a Where a.YYYY = ? and SUBSTR(a.orgcd,1,2) = ? GROUP by YYYY, SUBSTR(a.orgcd,1,2)||'00', ACCTCD, CREATEDT Order by 3

SELECT a.YYYY, ?, b.ACCTCD, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET01),0) EXECBUDGET01, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET01),0) REMBUDGET01, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET01),0) USEDBUDGET01, FINISHFLAG01, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET02),0) EXECBUDGET02, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET02),0) REMBUDGET02, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET02),0) USEDBUDGET02, FINISHFLAG02, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET03),0) EXECBUDGET03, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET03),0) REMBUDGET03, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET03),0) USEDBUDGET03, FINISHFLAG03, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET04),0) EXECBUDGET04, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET04),0) REMBUDGET04, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET04),0) USEDBUDGET04, FINISHFLAG04, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET05),0) EXECBUDGET05, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET05),0) REMBUDGET05, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET05),0) USEDBUDGET05, FINISHFLAG05, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET06),0) EXECBUDGET06, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET06),0) REMBUDGET06, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET06),0) USEDBUDGET06, FINISHFLAG06, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET07),0) EXECBUDGET07, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET07),0) REMBUDGET07, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET07),0) USEDBUDGET07, FINISHFLAG07, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET08),0) EXECBUDGET08, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET08),0) REMBUDGET08, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET08),0) USEDBUDGET08, FINISHFLAG08, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET09),0) EXECBUDGET09, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET09),0) REMBUDGET09, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET09),0) USEDBUDGET09, FINISHFLAG09, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET10),0) EXECBUDGET10, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET10),0) REMBUDGET10, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET10),0) USEDBUDGET10, FINISHFLAG10, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET11),0) EXECBUDGET11, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET11),0) REMBUDGET11, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET11),0) USEDBUDGET11, FINISHFLAG11, nvl(sum(EXECBUDGET12),0) EXECBUDGET12, nvl(sum(REMBUDGET12),0) REMBUDGET12, nvl(sum(USEDBUDGET12),0) USEDBUDGET12, FINISHFLAG12, CREATEDT, LASTUPDTM, LASTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) orgName, b.ACCTKNAME ACCTNAME FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGET a, (Select * from accttb Where AcctCD like '5___0') b Where a.YYYY = ? and a.orgcd = ? and substr(a.acctcd,1,4) = substr(b.acctcd,1,4) and substr(a.acctcd,1,4) = substr(?,1,4) group by a.YYYY, ?, b.acctcd, CREATEDT, LASTUPDTM, LASTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD), b.ACCTKNAME, FINISHFLAG01,FINISHFLAG02,FINISHFLAG03,FINISHFLAG04,FINISHFLAG05,FINISHFLAG06, FINISHFLAG07,FINISHFLAG08,FINISHFLAG09,FINISHFLAG10,FINISHFLAG11,FINISHFLAG12 Order by 3

SELECT a.yyyy||a.orgcd||a.acctCd key, a.YYYY, a.OrgCD, a.ACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(a.ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, EXECBUDGET01, REMBUDGET01, USEDBUDGET01, FINISHFLAG01, EXECBUDGET02, REMBUDGET02, USEDBUDGET02, FINISHFLAG02, EXECBUDGET03, REMBUDGET03, USEDBUDGET03, FINISHFLAG03, EXECBUDGET04, REMBUDGET04, USEDBUDGET04, FINISHFLAG04, EXECBUDGET05, REMBUDGET05, USEDBUDGET05, FINISHFLAG05, EXECBUDGET06, REMBUDGET06, USEDBUDGET06, FINISHFLAG06, EXECBUDGET07, REMBUDGET07, USEDBUDGET07, FINISHFLAG07, EXECBUDGET08, REMBUDGET08, USEDBUDGET08, FINISHFLAG08, EXECBUDGET09, REMBUDGET09, USEDBUDGET09, FINISHFLAG09, EXECBUDGET10, REMBUDGET10, USEDBUDGET10, FINISHFLAG10, EXECBUDGET11, REMBUDGET11, USEDBUDGET11, FINISHFLAG11, EXECBUDGET12, REMBUDGET12, USEDBUDGET12, FINISHFLAG12, a.CREATEDT, a.LASTUPDTM, a.LASTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) orgName, b.YYYY, b.OrgCD, SUBSTR(b.dacctCD,1,4)||'0' acctCd, b.DACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(b.DACCTCD) DACCTNAME, b.PLANBUD01, b.EXECBUD01, b.REMBUD01, b.USEDBUD01, b.FINFLAG01, b.PLANBUD02, b.EXECBUD02, b.REMBUD02, b.USEDBUD02, b.FINFLAG02, b.PLANBUD03, b.EXECBUD03, b.REMBUD03, b.USEDBUD03, b.FINFLAG03, b.PLANBUD04, b.EXECBUD04, b.REMBUD04, b.USEDBUD04, b.FINFLAG04, b.PLANBUD05, b.EXECBUD05, b.REMBUD05, b.USEDBUD05, b.FINFLAG05, b.PLANBUD06, b.EXECBUD06, b.REMBUD06, b.USEDBUD06, b.FINFLAG06, b.PLANBUD07, b.EXECBUD07, b.REMBUD07, b.USEDBUD07, b.FINFLAG07, b.PLANBUD08, b.EXECBUD08, b.REMBUD08, b.USEDBUD08, b.FINFLAG08, b.PLANBUD09, b.EXECBUD09, b.REMBUD09, b.USEDBUD09, b.FINFLAG09, b.PLANBUD10, b.EXECBUD10, b.REMBUD10, b.USEDBUD10, b.FINFLAG10, b.PLANBUD11, b.EXECBUD11, b.REMBUD11, b.USEDBUD11, b.FINFLAG11, b.PLANBUD12, b.EXECBUD12, b.REMBUD12, b.USEDBUD12, b.FINFLAG12, b.CREDT, b.LSTUPDTM, b.LSTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(b.ORGCD) orgName FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGET a, MASM_INHAUH.BUDGETDETAIL b Where a.YYYY = b.YYYY and a.orgcd = b.ORGCD and a.acctcd = SUBSTR(b.dacctCD,1,4)||'0' And a.yyyy = ? And a.OrgCd = ? And a.AcctCd = ? Order by 3

SELECT a.yyyy||a.orgcd||a.acctCd key, a.YYYY, a.OrgCD, a.ACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(a.ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, get_budgetPlan(?,?,a.acctcd) EXECBUDGET, get_budget(?,?,a.acctcd) REMBUDGET, get_budgetUsed(?,?,a.acctcd) USEDBUDGET, get_execbudgetsum(?,?,a.acctcd) EXECBUDGETSUM, get_execbudgetsum(?,?,a.acctcd) - get_UsedbudgetSum(?,?,a.acctcd) REMBUDGETSUM, get_UsedbudgetSum(?,?,a.acctcd) USEDBUDGETSUM, a.CREATEDT, a.LASTUPDTM, a.LASTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) orgName, b.YYYY, b.OrgCD, SUBSTR(b.dacctCD,1,4)||'0' acctCd, b.DACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(b.DACCTCD) DACCTNAME, b.PLANBUD01, b.EXECBUD01, b.REMBUD01, b.USEDBUD01, b.FINFLAG01, b.PLANBUD02, b.EXECBUD02, b.REMBUD02, b.USEDBUD02, b.FINFLAG02, b.PLANBUD03, b.EXECBUD03, b.REMBUD03, b.USEDBUD03, b.FINFLAG03, b.PLANBUD04, b.EXECBUD04, b.REMBUD04, b.USEDBUD04, b.FINFLAG04, b.PLANBUD05, b.EXECBUD05, b.REMBUD05, b.USEDBUD05, b.FINFLAG05, b.PLANBUD06, b.EXECBUD06, b.REMBUD06, b.USEDBUD06, b.FINFLAG06, b.PLANBUD07, b.EXECBUD07, b.REMBUD07, b.USEDBUD07, b.FINFLAG07, b.PLANBUD08, b.EXECBUD08, b.REMBUD08, b.USEDBUD08, b.FINFLAG08, b.PLANBUD09, b.EXECBUD09, b.REMBUD09, b.USEDBUD09, b.FINFLAG09, b.PLANBUD10, b.EXECBUD10, b.REMBUD10, b.USEDBUD10, b.FINFLAG10, b.PLANBUD11, b.EXECBUD11, b.REMBUD11, b.USEDBUD11, b.FINFLAG11, b.PLANBUD12, b.EXECBUD12, b.REMBUD12, b.USEDBUD12, b.FINFLAG12, b.CREDT, b.LSTUPDTM, b.LSTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(b.ORGCD) orgName FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGET a, MASM_INHAUH.BUDGETDETAIL b Where a.YYYY = b.YYYY and a.orgcd = b.ORGCD and a.acctcd = SUBSTR(b.dacctCD,1,4)||'0' And a.yyyy = ? And a.OrgCd = ? And a.AcctCd = ? Order by 3

SELECT a.YYYY, a.OrgCD, a.ACCTCD, TO_ACCTNAME(a.ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, a.EXECBUDGET01, a.REMBUDGET01, a.USEDBUDGET01, a.FINISHFLAG01, a.EXECBUDGET02, a.REMBUDGET02, a.USEDBUDGET02, a.FINISHFLAG02, a.EXECBUDGET03, a.REMBUDGET03, a.USEDBUDGET03, a.FINISHFLAG03, a.EXECBUDGET04, a.REMBUDGET04, a.USEDBUDGET04, a.FINISHFLAG04, a.EXECBUDGET05, a.REMBUDGET05, a.USEDBUDGET05, a.FINISHFLAG05, a.EXECBUDGET06, a.REMBUDGET06, a.USEDBUDGET06, a.FINISHFLAG06, a.EXECBUDGET07, a.REMBUDGET07, a.USEDBUDGET07, a.FINISHFLAG07, a.EXECBUDGET08, a.REMBUDGET08, a.USEDBUDGET08, a.FINISHFLAG08, a.EXECBUDGET09, a.REMBUDGET09, a.USEDBUDGET09, a.FINISHFLAG09, a.EXECBUDGET10, a.REMBUDGET10, a.USEDBUDGET10, a.FINISHFLAG10, a.EXECBUDGET11, a.REMBUDGET11, a.USEDBUDGET11, a.FINISHFLAG11, a.EXECBUDGET12, a.REMBUDGET12, a.USEDBUDGET12, a.FINISHFLAG12, a.CREATEDT, a.LASTUPDTM, a.LASTUPEMPID, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) orgName FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGET a Where a.yyyy = ? and SUBSTR(a.orgcd,1,2) = ? AND a.acctCd = ? Order by 2, 3

SELECT YM, ORGCD, ACCTCD, SN, CHANGETYPE, BEFORAMT, REQUESTAMT, CONFIRMAMT, CREMPID, DOCSNNO, AGENDA, TO_CHAR(CREDTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') CREDTM, TO_ORGCDNAME(ORGCD) ORGNAME, TO_ACCTNAME(ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, to_empKname(CREMPID) crempName, to_empgradename(CREMPID) crgradename FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGETLOG WHERE ORGCD = ? AND YM like ?||'%' Order by 3, 1

SELECT a.YM, a.ORGCD, a.ACCTCD, a.SN, a.CHANGETYPE, a.BEFORAMT, a.REQUESTAMT, a.CONFIRMAMT, a.CREMPID, a.DOCSNNO, a.AGENDA, a.CREDTM, TO_CHAR(b.PROCDTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') PROCDTM, Substr(b.jobNo,1,5) jobNo, get_jobName(Substr(b.jobNo,1,5)) jobName, GET_PRODBIZNO(Substr(b.jobNo,1,5)) bizNo, to_bizName(GET_PRODBIZNO(Substr(b.jobNo,1,5))) bizName, TO_ORGCDNAME(a.ORGCD) ORGNAME, TO_ACCTNAME(a.ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, to_empKname(a.CREMPID) crempName, to_empgradename(a.CREMPID) crgradename FROM MASM_INHAUH.BUDGETLOG a, MASM_INHAUH.BUDGETDOCDETAIL b WHERE a.ORGCD = ? AND a.YM = ? AND a.acctCd = ? AND a.SN = ? AND DOCSNNO = b.mainNo||Lpad(TO_CHAR((b.sn)), 2,'0') Order by 3, 1
WHERE YYYY = ? AND ORGCD = ? AND ACCTCD = ?
WHERE YYYY = ? AND ORGCD = ? AND DACCTCD = ?

INSERT INTO MASM_INHAUH.BUDGETLOG (YM, ORGCD, ACCTCD, SN, CHANGETYPE, BEFORAMT, REQUESTAMT, CONFIRMAMT, CREMPID, DOCSNNO, AGENDA, CREDTM) values(?, ?, ?, (select nvl(max(to_number(SN)),0)+1 sn from BudgetLog Where YM=? AND ORGCD = ? AND ACCTCD = ?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE)
